name: Snickerdoodle Bread
author: recipecollector
summary: My husband loves snickerdoodle cookies. When I made this snickerdoodle bread, he said that he likes it better than banana bread.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package cinnamon chips (such as HERSHEY'S®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cream together sugar, butter, cinnamon, and salt with an electric mixer until fluffy, about 5 minutes
Mix in sour cream and vanilla until combined
Combine flour and baking powder in a separate bowl
Pour into egg mixture and mix well
Spoon batter into 4 mini loaf pans until 2/3 full
Mix 3 tablespoons sugar and cinnamon together in a small bowl
Sprinkle topping over the batter in each loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the centers come out clean, 35 to 38 minutes
Let cool completely before removing from the pans
